faq.question: What does Nykaa do?
faq.answer: Nykaa is an Indian beauty, personal care, and lifestyle company that operates an online marketplace and physical stores. It offers products from multiple brands as well as its own labels across beauty, personal care, fashion, and lifestyle categories.

faq.question: Is Nykaa an online or offline platform?
faq.answer: Nykaa follows an omnichannel model, selling through its website, mobile apps, and a network of physical stores in multiple cities.

faq.question: Does Nykaa have its own brands?
faq.answer: Yes, Nykaa has several in-house brands across makeup, skincare, personal care, and other categories, sold primarily through its own online and offline channels.

faq.question: Who is Nykaa for?
faq.answer: Nykaa caters to customers looking for beauty, personal care, and fashion products—from daily essentials to premium and luxury brands—across different age groups and price segments.

faq.question: How does Nykaa price its products?
faq.answer: Product prices are set by Nykaa and brand partners, and vary by brand, category, and range. Customers often see regular promotions, festival offers, and loyalty benefits.

faq.question: Does Nykaa offer COD and returns?
faq.answer: Nykaa typically offers cash-on-delivery and return or exchange options on eligible products and pin codes, subject to category- and policy-specific conditions published on its site.
